All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable, DatatypeNode, TreeComponent
public class SGAbstractNode
extends SGStringNode

SGAbstractNode is a SGStringNode that contains an abstract (a large piece of text).

Version:
1.2 2007/12/12
Author:
Feikje Hielkema
